snippet: On Wednesday, Senator Dianne Feinstein, Democrat of California, watched her fellow senators end her push for a renewal of the federal assault weapons ban as they scuttled a broader package of gun control legislation.
abstract: Senate's vote, 40 to 60, rejecting renewal of assault weapons ban as they scuttled broader package of gun control legislation is decisive and personal defeat for Democratic Sen Dianne Feinstein of California.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, Senator Dianne Feinstein, Democrat of California, watched her fellow senators end her push for a renewal of the federal assault weapons ban as they scuttled a broader package of gun control legislation.

headline.seo: For Feinstein, Gun Control Measure’s Defeat Was Personal
headline.main: For Senator, Bill’s Defeat Is Personal and Political
headline.print_headline: For Senator, Bill’s Defeat Is Personal And Political
